abstract: Consolidation in the sector is long overdue, as the encroaching power of the likes of Amazon and Target has been evident for years, the author writes.
snippet: Consolidation in the sector is long overdue, as the encroaching power of the likes of Amazon and Target has been evident for years, the author writes.
lead_paragraph: Office Depot and OfficeMax are lucky to have each other. Uniting the two purveyors of pens, paper clips and printer toner is about as obvious as it gets in mergers and acquisitions. The potential synergies could be worth more than the market value of the two companies combined. As the Internet ravishes retailing, at least this corner can cling to life by merger.

headline.main: For Office Supply Stores, an Obvious Merger
